author: Daniel Greene
description:
Join me as I delve into the newly released trailer for The Wheel of Time Season 3, set to premiere on March 13, 2025. As a fan of Robert Jordan's epic fantasy series, I'm excited to share my thoughts and insights on the upcoming season.

00:00 hindsight thoughts
04:32 Trailer reaction 

In this video, we'll explore:

🎬 Trailer Breakdown: Analyzing key scenes, character appearances, and hidden details you might have missed.

📖 Book Comparisons: Discussing how the show's third season may adapt elements from The Shadow Rising, the fourth book in the series.

🔮 Predictions and Theories: Speculating on plot developments, character arcs, and what fans can anticipate in the new season.
